dialogue.text: I understand you were working the bar the night of the murder. I need to know everything you saw.

npc_response.text: Yeah... yeah, I was there. It was a busy night. Too many people... but yeah, I remember seeing him.

choices.text: I don’t have time for vague answers. What did you see?

response.npc_text: Alright! Calm down! He was tall, wearing a dark jacket, but... I didn’t get a good look at his face. He had a hat on, I think...

choices.text: Take your time. I just need the facts. Start from the beginning.

response.npc_text: Okay... I noticed him a little after midnight. He was at the bar, not drinking though. Just... watching people. Gave me the creeps.

choices.text: I get it, this isn't easy. But you’re helping us solve a murder. Tell me what you know.

response.npc_text: Thanks... It’s just... I didn’t expect this. He seemed out of place, you know? Like he didn’t belong there. But I did notice his shoes — they were expensive, polished. Weird for that place.

dialogue.text: You said you didn’t see his face clearly. Can you tell me more about his behavior? Did he speak to anyone?

npc_response.text: He wasn’t talking to anyone. Just stood there, watching. Creepy.

choices.text: Where did he go after you saw him at the bar?

response.npc_text: I’m not sure... I think he slipped out before anyone else noticed. I was busy at the bar when I looked up, and he was gone.

choices.text: How was he acting? Nervous? Confident?

response.npc_text: Confident, I’d say. He didn’t seem nervous at all. Like he knew what he was doing.

choices.text: Did anyone else notice him? Maybe talk to him?

response.npc_text: No, I don’t think so. He kept to himself the whole time.
